item.title: DreamStation.cc Show - Episode 100
item.dc:creator: cnc137
item.description:
We are finally back with another episode of the DreamStation.cc Show video game audio podcast after taking over two years off. This episode includes the following topics:
Skylanders: Spyro’s Adventure Review Pokemon Rumble Blast’s Pre-Order Pins at GameStop GameStop Complaints
Hosts:
Chris - cnc137 Rusty - z36
Intro/Outro Background Music:
Toronto Underground by danielreal2k
Related Links:
Skylanders: Spyro’s Adventure Pokemon Rumble Blast GameStop

Racing Against Live Professional Race Car Drivers In Real-time On Your Favorite Gaming System Coming Soon??? Garfield: Lasagna World Tour Makes it to Retail Anarchy Online Celebrates Seven Years of Operation Atlus and NIS America Team Up to Distribute Three Games in North America PlayStation 3 Firmware Update v2.41 Includes Trophies and In-Game XMB PlayStation 3 Trophies and the Supported Games Castlevania Judgment Announced Exclusively for Wii Apogee Returns to Bring Duke Nukem to Nintendo DS and PSP Nintendo Introduces the Wii MotionPlus Xbox 360 Console Now Offers Triple the Storage for Same Price Trauma Center: Under the Knife 2 Demo Available Via Wii Nintendo Channel Nyko Announces Intercooler TS for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 Microsoft and Netflix Unveil Partnership to Instantly Stream Movies and TV Episodes to the TV via Xbox LIVE New Xbox Experiences Reinvent Home Entertainment, and Everyone Is Invited New 80GB PlayStation 3, Limited Edition PS2 Bundle, and New PSP Entertainment Pack Announced PlayStation 3 Backwards Compatibility Guitar Hero, Rock Band, and Rock Revolution Guitars and Drums - How Many Do We Need? Nintendo Again Redefines Game Control, Puts Spotlight on Community Building - Animal Crossing: City Folk, WiiSpeak, Wii Sports Resort, Wii Music, and Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars Wii Music - Will it appeal to Rock Band and Guitar Hero fans? Metal Gear Online World Championship 2008 Announced Link Your PlayStation Underground ID with Your PlayStation Network ID ProjectAbraham.com Equals Resistance 2 Promotional Website Ubisoft Announces I Am Alive Games for Windows Live Now Free for Developers and Consumers Live Anywhere Rant! - Where is Microsoft's Live Anywhere for PC and mobile devices? Wii is the Number 1 Home Console in U.S. According to NPD Data Apple iPhone 3G and the App Store iPhone Mini Game Reviews -Crash Bandicoot Nitro Kart 3D, Super Monkey Ball, Bomberman Touch: The Legend of Mystic Bomb Sonic and the Black Knight Announced as Wii Exclusive Gears of War Novels Announced by Del Rey Dead Rising: Chop Til You Drop Announced for Wii Bananagrams Game for Facebook Coming Soon from Majesco Mortal Kombat: Kollection Kombining Three Fan Favorites This Fall On PS2 Star Trek Online Announced by Cryptic Studios Champions Online Chili Cook-Off PlayStation 3 Greatest Hits Worthless Fact - Ultima Online

item.itunes:subtitle: Yo, bro mans (and ladies)! We are back with another righteous episode of the DreamStation.cc Show and we think the show totally rocks! Dudes, in ...
item.itunes:summary:
Yo, bro mans (and ladies)! We are back with another righteous episode of the DreamStation.cc Show and we think the show totally rocks! Dudes, in this episode we talk about the following totally awesome video game topics that are like woaaaah. We don't take on any jellies in this episode, but we still think the show rocks, dudes.
NBA Playoffs - Boston Celtics Win! DreamStation.cc Mountain Dew Old School, New School Contest Information Do you buy Xbox 360 games over their PS3 and Wii counterparts just for the Achievements? Paying for Cheat Codes from Codemasters and Other Video Game Companies Gears of War Price Drop and Two Disc Special Edition Announced Age of Empires: Mythologies Coming to Nintendo DS This Fall Kung Fu Panda Video Game Released by Activision Spyborgs for Wii Announced by Capcom Ninja Gaiden II Is Now Available in North America for Xbox 360 Nintendo DS Lite in Green, Ice Blue, and Red Revealed Crysis Warhead Coming This Fall From Crytek and EA NVIDIA GeForce GTX 200 GPUs Released for PC PC Game Development Related to Home Console Lifecycles Kevin Garnett of the Boston Celtics Chosen as the Cover Athlete for NBA 2K9 Fallout 3 Survival Edition Announced by Bethesda Softworks and Amazon.com Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Colonization Conquering Games for Windows This Fall Square Enix Announces RPG Line-Up for Xbox 360 Monster Jam: Urban Assault Announced by Activision High School Musical 3: Senior Year DANCE! Coming Christmas 2008 Fatal Inertia EX Coming Exclusively to PlayStation Store on June 19, 2008 Nintendo DS Lite and Guitar Hero: On Tour Bundle Coming June 22, 2008 Jillian Michaels' Fitness Ultimatum 2009 Announced for Wii Unreal Tournament 3 Coming to Xbox 360 July 7 Tornado Coming to Nintendo DS from Ignition Entertainment and Success Coldplay's New Single Released as Part of Downloadable Songpack for Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock Bratz Girls Really Rock Coming This Fall EA SPORTS Fantasy Football to Integrate With Madden NFL 09 Cooking Guide: Can't decide what to eat? Available for Nintendo DS in Europe Shaun the Sheep Coming Exclusively to Nintendo DS Legendary Pokeacute;mon Coming to a GameStop Near You Tiger Woods PGA Tour 09 Introduces New Performance Coach Feature Last King of Africa Announced for Nintendo DS Savage 2: A Tortured Soul Receives Second Free Content Update Forums Hot Topics Worthless Fact
Hosts:
Chris - cnc137 Ben - Redeema
Intro/Outro Background Music:
Toronto Underground by danielreal2k
Related Links:

Landing on Wii This Fall DanceDanceRevolution Celebrates 10th Anniversary With Three New Games Rock Revolution Aims to Redefine the Rhythm Genre The Sims 2 IKEA Home Stuff Brings Swedish Design to Your Sims' Home Xbox 360 Reaches 10 Million Systems Sold in United States Metallic Rose Joins Nintendo DS Color Palette Georgia Boosts Incentives for Entertainment Industry Age of Conan Collector's Edition Completely Sold Out Wii Fit Makes Fitness Fun Codemasters Secures Official FORMULA 1 License GRID Demo Surpasses One Million Downloads The Cars Classic 1978 Self-Titled Debut Album Now Available for Rock Band ArchLord Exceeds Half a Million Players Dr. Mario Online Rx and Metal Slug Highlight This Weeks Wii Shop Channel Additions Age of Conan Sells Over 400,000 Copies Within Days of Launch World Cyber Games U.S. Open Kicks Off May 31st in New York City SCORE International Baja 1000 Coming Fall 2008 BioShock Genetically Enhanced For PLAYSTATION 3 Coming This October First Street Fighter IV Video to Debut May 31 During CBS EliteXC New Prince of Persia First Details SimCity Creator Coming to Wii and Nintendo DS September 2008 Mass Effect for PC Now Available in North America Wii Fit NASCAR and IndyCar Raced This Past Weekend Don King Presents: Prizefighter Soundtrack and Ring Walk Music Announced EliteXC Fighter and American Gladiator Gina Carano To Appear In Command #38; Conquer Red Alert 3 Free Pokemon Character At Toys R Us This Weekend Splatterhouse Coming to Xbox 360 and PS3 in 2009 Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop 3 For Nintendo DS Goes Gold Metal Gear Solid 4 Limited Edition PLAYSTATION 3 Bundle Available For Pre-Order Wii Fit for Wii Review Forums Hot Topics Worthless Fact

item.title: DreamStation.cc Show - Episode 94
item.dc:creator: cnc137
item.description: Mike Pepe, Brand Manager of Hudson Entertainment was willing to join us on Episode 94 of the DreamStation.cc Show to talk about Deca Sports, Deca Sports 2, Hudson Entertainment, and how to get started in the video game industry. On top of this exclusive interview with Hudson Entertainment we also talked about the following [...]
item.itunes:subtitle: Mike Pepe, Brand Manager of Hudson Entertainment was willing to join us on Episode 94 of the DreamStation.cc Show to talk about Deca Sports, Deca ...
item.itunes:summary:
Mike Pepe, Brand Manager of Hudson Entertainment was willing to join us on Episode 94 of the DreamStation.cc Show to talk about Deca Sports, Deca Sports 2, Hudson Entertainment, and how to get started in the video game industry. On top of this exclusive interview with Hudson Entertainment we also talked about the following topics on the 1st half of the show:
Kane #38; Lynch: Dead Men Get Four Free Downloadable Maps April 17 Pokeacute;mon and Nintendo Team Up to Combat Trading Card Piracy Chengdu, China Selected as the Host City for the 2009 World Cyber Games Grand Final Fatal Fury: Battle Archives Vol. 2 Ships for the PlayStation 2 Sierra Entertainment Launches Full PROTOTYPE Web Site SEGA Announces the Incredible Hulk Voice Talent Major League Gaming Kicks Off 2008 Season With Live World Premiere of New Halo 3 Map Commander In Chief Announced Baroque Creeps and Crawls Into Stores Metal Gear Solid 4 Standard and Limited Edition Pricing Revealed Manga Fighter Grand Opening - You're Invited Teenage Zombies: Invasion of the Alien Brainy Thingys Has Gone Gold Mario Super Sluggers Announced for Wii Enhanced PLAYSTATION Store Launches April 15th in Europe and North America OGPlanet Brings La Tale to North America New Ms. Pac Man and Tapper World Records Set at Barcade The Ant Commandos Announce New Guitar Controllers and Accessories Pipemania Returns This Summer Cal Ripken's Real Baseball MMO Announces Its First 2008 Tournament The Witcher Adventure Editor, New Adventure and Patch 1.3 Available Now Forums Hot Topics Worthless Fact Deca Sports Interview with Mike Pepe, Brand Manager of Hudson Entertainment
Hosts:
Chris - cnc137 Ben - Redeema
Intro/Outro Background Music:
Toronto Underground by danielreal2k

item.itunes:summary:
The 92nd DreamStation.cc Show episode is now available with 200% more Pokeacute;lovin'. We went over our time limit again this week and once again are providing you with almost an hour and a half of video game industry coverage.
The topics covered in this video game audio podcast are as follows:
Pepsi Stuff Points Contest Lost in Blue 3 for Nintendo DS Ships Street Fighter Live-Action Film Cast Announced Final Fantasy Tactics A2: Grimoire of the Rift Coming This Summer Rock Band Downloadable Content Goes "Six Times Platinum" Battlefield: Bad Company Multiplayer Beta Program Announced SEGA Superstars Tennis Available Now Ubisoft Acquires Tom Clancy Name for Future Games, Books, Movies, #38; Merchandising Crisis Core - Final Fantasy VII Event at PlayStation Store at Metreon Major League Baseball 2K8 Opening Day Xbox LIVE Weekend Announced Rock Band Touring Wii on June 22 Gran Turismo 5 Prologue Soundtrack Revealed NBA Ballers: Chosen One Complete Roster Unveiled Razer is Proud to Present Video Games Live Halo 3 Heroic Map Pack Now Available Free of Charge Rainbow Six Vegas 2 Exclusive Map at GameStop Code Revealed Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning Collector's Edition Unveiled Code Lyoko: Fall of X.A.N.A Coming to Nintendo DS in June 50 Cent: Blood on the Sand Announced for Xbox 360 and PS3 SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Confrontation Coming to PlayStation 3 September 16, 2008 Limited Edition Grand Theft Auto IV Xbox 360 and Other Collector's Edition Systems Xbox Issues Gamerscore Corrections for Cheaters Super Smash Bros. Brawl Review - Part 2 Worthless Fact
Hosts:
Chris - cnc137 Ben - Redeema Jeff - Lead
Intro/Outro Background Music:
Toronto Underground by danielreal2k
